name: CTRL User Generator
author: Willem Dumee

sections.description:
Generate fake users easily for testing purposes. You can choose between 2 themes:
* Star Wars
* The Simpsons

User Generator will generate id, username, screenname and email for the amount of users that you have set.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ctrl-user-generator directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
I would like to submit a new user ‘theme’ is that possible?

Yes, that’s possible. Email me with your idea and if I agree I will create a new user ‘theme’ in the next release
sections.changelog:
0.7.1

Removed ‘WordPress gurus’ theme

0.7

Tested up to version 4.7.2
Changed email addresses of WP gurus to make sure they don’t exist

0.6

Tested up to version 4.6.1
Fix for text-domain

0.5

First version

short_description: Easily generate a bunch of new - fake - users to test your plugin / theme of website
